means: 漠不关心地，无忧无虑地，不感兴趣地

sentence.Network_en: War was breaking out in Europe, but she unconcernedly planned for a holiday.
sentence.Network_cn: 欧洲爆发了战争, 但她仍漠不关心地计划着度假.

sentence.Network_en: Striding unconcernedly toward them through the inches - deep dust came a priest.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个教士正踏着一寸多厚的灰尘,泰然自若地向他们走来.
他很随便地往四下望着.
